title: Chunky serif type on Focus magazine, Sweden
content:
Good morning everyone,

can anyone id this lovely serif used on the current issue of Focus magazine?

Thanks in advance,

Seb

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080123102042im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/2337_6486.jpg)

 [‹ Elegant Font and Funky Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080123102042/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40659 "Go to previous forum topic") [Metal Type ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080123102042/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40731 "Go to next forum topic")
author: all about seb

comments.content: [Stag](http://web.archive.org/web/20080123102042/http:/www.vllg.com/Schwartzco/Stag/mudTyper+Weights/) by [Christian Schwartz](http://web.archive.org/web/20080123102042/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Christian%252BSchwartz). The a’s are alternate characters.
Thank you Akira! It truly is a beauty...
